title: The Ladies Diner
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Fast food, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. 1950s American diner motif with lots of pink and rock n roll references. Has a separate menu for vegans that includes a variety of vegan burgers and salads. Coffee is fair trade. Previously operated as Pink Ladies - 50s Diner. Note: The kitchen closes at 9:30pm, no take-away after that.
